short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI to analyze legal, operational and agreement documents and allow you to Chat or Interact with them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to ParAILegal, the Chrome Extension created by @getApogee - the makers of Apogee Suite.

We are the best extension (and the only one) that allows you to automatically save your documents as you browse and analyze them as you need to.

Save from these places:
- Any PDF in your browser (not local files through the Extension)
- Any .doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx and .pdf that our extensions encounters while you're browsing on:
  - Gmail
  - Hotmail (Outlook)
  - Google Drive
  - OneDrive
  - SharePoint

And you also have the ability of highlighting text on any webpage and interacting with that text as well.
